column1: * Data from Hilton et al. (2013) Biogeosciences
**Data from Hilton et al. (2010) Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta
†Std. dev. is the difference between CO2 quantified on two vacuum lines
‡For soil samples without a corresponding bedrock sample, formation averages [as calculated in Hilton et al. (2010) Geochimica et Cosmochemica Acta] are used
